abstract: Business ethics is generally pretty straight forward. There are, however, occasions that make you stop and think. This is one of them.
snippet: Business ethics is generally pretty straight forward. There are, however, occasions that make you stop and think. This is one of them.
lead_paragraph: Ethics in business is generally black and white. Don’t lie. Do the right thing. Treat people fairly. If you have a good moral compass, it usually does not require much thought to run an ethical business. Or to be an ethical person. There are, however, occasions that make you stop and think. Here is one of them:

headline.main: Is All Fair in Love and Debt Collecting?
